song_lyrics: Anukampā ur dhārī re... Pragaṭ thayā° ṭek
Bhaktinā bhuvan viṣhe, tej tej tej dīse,
Tej viṣhe īsh īsh re... Pragaṭ thayā° 1
Ānand ānand chhāyo, samīr shītaḷ vāyo,
Motīḍāno megh āvyo re... Pragaṭ thayā° 2
Mānunī mangaḷ gāve, Harine jovāne āve,
Mukh joīne mud pāve re... Pragaṭ thayā° 3
Sur sau vimān lāvī, fūl vṛuṣhṭi kare āvī,
Prem pūro darshāvī re... Pragaṭ thayā° 4
Dās to Nāraṇ ke’chhe, Pūraṇ Puruṣhottam je chhe,
Dharmanā kumār te chhe re... Pragaṭ thayā° 5
title: Chhapaiyāmā sukhkārī re pragaṭ thayā

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-29: Narayandas

Category: Shri Harina Pad
